projects.title: Movie Generator App
projects.description: A React-based movie discovery application with dynamic filtering and modern UI
projects.longDescription: Built with React.js and HarperDB, this application allows users to discover movies with advanced filtering options. Features include real-time search, genre filtering, and responsive design.

projects.title: Aer Agency Website
projects.description: Modern agency website with responsive design and smooth animations
projects.longDescription: A professional agency website built with modern web technologies featuring responsive design, smooth animations, and optimized performance.

projects.title: Joker Card Design
projects.description: Interactive card design with CSS animations and modern UI elements
projects.longDescription: A creative card design project showcasing advanced CSS animations, hover effects, and modern UI design principles.

projects.title: Peaky Blinders Theme
projects.description: Dark themed website inspired by the Peaky Blinders series
projects.longDescription: A dark-themed website project inspired by the popular TV series, featuring modern design elements and smooth user interactions.

projects.title: Career Guide Platform
projects.description: Educational platform for career guidance and skill development
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive career guidance platform built to help users explore different career paths and develop relevant skills.
